item.description:
I have 2 tee times for 9:40am and 9:50am on Saturday, August 6th at Campbell's Scottish Highlands in Salem, NH. Easy to get to off Rte 93.  Only about 30-40 mins from Boston. Pleasant, somewhat links-style course with casual clubhouse. $66 greens fee includes cart.

http://www.scottishhighlandsgolf.com/

Just FYI:

Unfortunately, I can't add any additional tee times here - adjacent times are already booked (often find it difficult to get more than 2 consecutive tee times this early on a Saturday. It's easier to book 2+ tee times in the afternoon, but initial weekend forecast looked a little unstable for that this time around)!

I am starting a Waiting List though, so that if anyone's plans change between now and Saturday, then someone on the list might be able to join and we can still have 2 full groups go out.

Look forward to seeing everyone on Saturday for a fun round. And let's hope any potential showers keep their distance until the afternoon!

group.name: The Boston and Beyond Golf Group

item.name: Campbell's Scottish Highlands - Salem, NH
